entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:12 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 11:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
